alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cuyahoga County through 345 PM EDT... At 319 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Royalton, or 10 miles south of Cleveland, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Lakewood, Strongsville, North Royalton, Solon, Warrensville Heights, Garfield Heights, Maple Heights, Parma Heights, Broadview Heights, Brook Park, Middleburg Heights, Brecksville, Bedford, Seven Hills, Brooklyn, Bedford Heights, Independence and Walton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
